ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T14:27:50 [Issue ID 4000-145959] urn:comicvine:4000-145959 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 09:44:42. [Issue ID 1030889]
ComicInfo.Summary:
Contents include previews of March-April Marvel comics; Newswatch; a top ten list of best-selling Marvel books from April, 1983; a look at Jim Starlin's career with the company; a retrospective of the company's titles throughout 1961; an article on Conan (long before his license was acquired by Dark Horse), and "How to Color Comics the Marvel Way."
The issue also includes full-page ads promoting the original Marvel Super Heroes Secret Wars limited series, Marada the She-Wolf in Epic, and Alpha Flight #12 - ... And One Shall Surely Die.
